duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the design, implementation, and support of data and analytics solutions using Snowflake architecture.
Manage off-shore teams and collaborate with globally distributed teams on data projects.
Provide architectural assessments, strategies, and roadmaps for data and analytics technology.
Participate in configuring technical architecture and advise engineering teams on efficient use.
Lead and manage non-complex components of data migration and data project work plans.
Use various data sources like JSON, Parquet, and ORC for data migration and data warehouse optimization.
Experience with CI/CD using Gitlab, Github, and Test Automation using Selenium.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
